thread.title: Tinder is down and the app’s most desperate singles are freaking out
thread.title_full: Tinder is down and the app’s most desperate singles are freaking out

author: Dianike Saraswati
title: Tinder is down and the app’s most desperate singles are freaking out
text:
Home / Social Media / Tinder is down and the app’s most desperate singles are freaking out Tinder is down and the app’s most desperate singles are freaking out Now we know when Tinder is down its users freak out. 
Image: Leon Neal/Getty Images 2017-03-13 23:43:08 UTC The fear of being #foreveralone is real.
Tinder appeared to be having massive technical issues Monday afternoon, and users were not able to patiently wait to keep swiping and flirting. 
It’s unclear what’s wrong with the app and whether it’s only down for some users on certain devices or based on location. We’ve reached out to Tinder and will pass along any updates. 
Those updates may be beyond crucial for those looking for a date. As soon as the app went down, Twitter was filled with utter desperation and worries about potential love lost. @Tinder Not sure if you are aware of this, but your app is down in Orange County, CA. I pay for Tinder Plus so please look into this ASAP 
— Kermit (@n3ffarius) March 13, 2017 Is @Tinder down? Can’t log in at all. Was having a good conversation 🙁 
— Hunkrat (@junkerjam) March 13, 2017 Tinder is down rn… how am I supposed to use it and have no one swipe back? 
— Cameron 💤💤 (@cam_armstrong98) March 13, 2017 Tinder isn’t working and my wifi is down. Well now what the hell do I do?! 
— Søphie (@shopietiler) March 13, 2017 My friend is legit freaking out because her tinder hasn’t been working for 15 minutes 😂😂 
— Emilia (@emiliamessi) March 13, 2017 
Because today was definitely the day one of your Tinder matches was going to be the one .
